content: Hello Mister Heine, thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. Can we discuss the rental price?

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.

content:
I would like to negotiate, what would you offer?

I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month.

I want to negotiate, what would you offer? Please keep in mind that I am looking for the highest possible rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your interest in negotiating the rental price. Based on the apartment's size and your good credit history, I am willing to offer a rental price of 600 Euro per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
